myStatement: Helping people transform their digital visions into concrete web solutions is my professional calling
aboutText: I'm a 35 year old web developer from Gothenburg, Sweden. I love programming and solving problems. My current development stack is Visual Studio Code, Next.js, React, Tailwind, Node, Git and Git-Bash.
projectText: My good friend Lasse is an extremely talented designer, artist, painter. He deserves to have a place on the web where people can see/buy his art. Now the site is finally on its way
projectLink: See more of the project here
contactText:
Do you have an idea or a project you want to realize?
Send me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
